summary: JB suffers from a heart malformation .He falsifies his medical file ,so that he can enter a top athlete training center.
cast: Paul Bartel|Reda Kateb|Eddy Mitchell|Samy Seghir|Ralph Amoussou|Olivier Rabourdin|Ahmed Dramé|Adel Bencherif|Mathias Mlekuz|Margot Bancilhon|Clément Solignac|Antoine Bujoli|Robert Abogo|François Deblock|Amélie Chavaudra|Sidwell Weber|Cédric Ben Abdallah|Paola Guidicelli|Fabienne Darnaud|Isabelle Santos|Julien Derobe|Nassim Lyes|David Van de Woestyne|Flavien Dareau
title: Les petits princes
